ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( INCLUDES (HWS_SupportedQuoteTypes__c, "Damaged Part") && isblank (HWS_DamagedHWRepairFee__c), INCLUDES (HWS_SupportedQuoteTypes__c, "Damaged Part") && isblank (HWS_DamagedHWReplacementFee__c), INCLUDES (HWS_SupportedQuoteTypes__c, "Damaged Part") && isblank (HWS_RepackingHWPackingFee__c), INCLUDES (HWS_SupportedQuoteTypes__c, "Damaged Part") && isblank (HWS_HWAssessmentFee__c), INCLUDES (HWS_SupportedQuoteTypes__c, "Damaged Part") && isblank (HWS_DocumentationFee__c),
INCLUDES(HWS_SupportedQuoteTypes__c, "Unreturned Part") && isblank (HWS_HWUnreturnedPartFee__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
For Damaged Part quote type, do not populate HW Unreturned Part Fee.
For Unreturned Part quote type, do not populate fields related to Damaged HW fees.
